mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.`type`, m. NAME, m.logo, m.content, ifnull(i.mark, m.mark) AS mark, m.userID, m.statusID, m.createTime, m.updateTime, m.timeInterval, m.materialClassID, m.contrastRegionID FROM ( SELECT * FROM page_report WHERE id = #{reportId} ) m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM page_repor_remark WHERE userId = #{userId} ) i ON m.id = i.reportId

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.`name` AS "title", a.dataType AS "dataType", a.type AS "type", a.contrastRegionID as "contrastRegionID", a.materialClassID as "materialClassID", group_concat(DISTINCT b. NAME) AS "materialName", group_concat(DISTINCT c. NAME) AS "areaName", a.timeInterval AS "timeInterval", a.startTime AS "startTime", a.endTime AS "endTime" FROM page_report a LEFT JOIN hlidx_category b ON find_in_set(b.id,a.materialClassID) LEFT JOIN hlidx_areas c ON find_in_set(c.id,a.contrastRegionID) WHERE a.statusID = 'qy' and a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.name FROM hlidx_category a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM page_material_pice a WHERE a.type = '0' AND FIND_IN_SET(a.area, '53') AND FIND_IN_SET(a.mid, '8,9,10,11,12,13,16,17,18,19,20,21,22,37,23,24,43,28,29,30,32,33,46,45,42,47') AND month (mdate) = #{timeIntervalMonth} AND year(mdate) = #{timeIntervalYear}
AND a.huanbi > 0
AND a.huanbi < 0
AND a.huanbi = 0
